TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemContainerTemplate extends System.Windows.DataTemplate

Docs.summary: Provides the template for producing a container for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate"> class.
Gets the default key of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If you do not set the [x:Key Directive](../Topic/x:Key%20Directive.md) on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> that is in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>, the ItemContainerTemplateKey is used as the key.
